sentences: In conclusion, Co-Chair Rønneberg said the meeting had been successful and that the Co-Chairs would provide an oral report of the workshop at COP-5.

He said they would also prepare a non-paper on elements of a compliance system based on the annex to the note of the Co-Chairs of the JWG (FCCC/SB/1999/7), Parties' submissions (FCCC/SB/1999/7/Add.1) and discussions during the workshop.
He thanked the organizers of the workshop as well as its sponsors: Austria, Canada, the EC, Finland, France, Germany, Japan and Switzerland.
He closed the meeting at 1:00 PM on Thursday, 7 October.
enb_long_title: Informal Exchange of Views and Information on Compliance Under the Kyoto Protocol
